Game doesn't support Classic Controller, however game uses sideways remote. Choose "Horizontal WiiMote" option in "Use GamePad as" Options. When game starts, make sure to go to Options Menu => Change Control Method [p1] to +Control Pad. Pressing the Home button on the GamePad, then the Home button again to get back into the game will result in a "Please remove any extension controllers" message. To get around this, hold down the POWER button on GamePad until GamePad turns off, wait a few seconds, then press Power button again. Also works on EUR region console.

Use "Force Classic Controller" setting in "Use GamePad as" options. If you wish to play multiplayer using Wii Remote + Nunchuck then select NO to GamePad play with Nunchuck connected. Not all challenges stages tested. Launching the following Classic Titles: Kirby's Adventure, Kirby Super Star and Kirby's Dream Land 3 will boot to black screen and system will freeze on EUR region console. Every classic game works. Gamepad as CC is unable to sync after loading a Classic title, but Gamepad as horizontal Wiimote emulation works as intended. Also works on EUR region console.
Game is not playable past the initial bootup screen. Instead of loading after pressing A the game crashes and the Wii U needs to be restarted.
Game was injected as a whole wfbs file in the Wii U's NAND. Resetting whilst playing the game's ROMs will take you back to the game's main menu, just like the original collection did.

Game does not support Classic Controller however game uses sideways remote, inject game using Horizontal Wii Remote emulation. Please note that you will not be able to exit back to the WiiU menu. Use the GamePad's power button to safely shut down the console instead. Also works on EUR region console.

Also known as Kirby's Adventure - EU, game uses Sideway remote for gameplay so Wiimote emulation patch works and game boots fine, however at the title screen, you'll get the "Please disconnect the unsupported external extension controller from the Wii Remote". You wont be able to get back this screen. Classic Controller GCT codes can't be used since the main.dol file has Metafortress protection. Any mods to the main.dol file will result in black screen. Also works on EUR region console.

Gamepad works if main.dol is patched with Floating IPS file or Riivolution XML File to disable Metafortress, and a Classic Controller Support Code. Metafortress Protection MUST BE REMOVED, OR THE GAME WILL BOOT TO A BLACK SCREEN!  https://gbatemp.net/threads/new-classic-controller-hacks.659837/post-10544615
Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. See notes for USA version of this game.

Use "Force Classic Controller" setting in "Use GamePad as" options. Controls are awkward because game is using vertical controls at the start, before the innings starts there is option to change control scheme to horizontal which disables all motion control and game plays fine. Despite the conpatibility guide telling you to use Force Classic Controller, that will NOT work. It receives one input then stops taking inputs. Must inject with HORIZONTAL Wii remote. Controls are awkward since it thinks you are using a vertical wii remote, but you can change the controls before the innings start.

Use "Force Classic Controller" setting in "Use GamePad as" options, tested and working. Game doesn't support Classic Controller, but can be patched with "Horizontal or Vertical Wii Remote Emulation". Monopoly Streets sideways remote is correct using Horizontal patch, but Monopoly thinks its vertical mode. If you patch using Vertical, Monopoloy sideways remote is correct but Monopoly Street think it's vertical. So use one or the other. Must patch emulate the Wii Remote instead of the Classic Controller and in "Vertical" mode, normally you would select Horizontal, but for this game Vertical mode must be selected so the controls are in the correct orientation on the GamePad. IMPORTANT: When at the intro screen where it asks to press 2 to continue, you need to keep pressing the A button to get past the next Main selection screen and into the World Tour menu, once here, just press B to get back to the Main selection menu. Fail to do so will result in the GamePad not working, resync will not fix this as the HOME button doesn't register. So you can't exit back to WiiU menu, only way is to turn the game off by the GamePad power button, hold the power button on WiiU console or Pull the power plug. Also works on EUR region console.
